metadata.title: CVE-2024-46292 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow in modsecurity v3.0.12 allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service (DoS) via a crafted input inserted into the name parameter.NOTE: this is disputed by the Supplier because it cannot be reproduced.Also, the product's documentation indicates that it is not guaranteed to beusable with very large values of SecRequestBodyNoFilesLimit (which arerequired by the claimed issue).

criterions.comment: modsecurity package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
